channel.title: CVE Feed for VMware -- NSX Edge
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VMware -- NSX Edge

item.title: CVE-2017-4929|2024-09-16T18:18:54.701Z -- vmware -- nsx%20edge
item.description: VMware NSX Edge (6.2.x before 6.2.9 and 6.3.x before 6.3.5) contains a moderate Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) issue which may lead to information disclosure.
